verses.verse: וַיִּפְשַׁ֤ע <S%H6586><s%> vai-yif-Sha' rebelled מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av Then Moab בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, against Israel אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after מ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> Mot the death אַחְאָֽב׃ <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av. of Ahab

וַיִּפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol fell down אֲחַזְיָ֜ה <S%H274><s%> 'a-chaz-Yah And Ahaziah בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad through הַשְּׂבָכָ֗ה <S%H7639><s%> has-se-va-Chah, through a lattice בַּעֲלִיָּת֛וֹ <S%H5944><s%> ba-'a-li-ya-To in his upper chamber אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּשֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> be-sho-me-Ron that [was] in Samaria וַיָּ֑חַל <S%H2470><s%> vai-Ya-chal; and was sick וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim, messengers וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go דִרְשׁ֗וּ <S%H1875><s%> dir-Shu, enquire בְּבַ֤עַל be-Va-'al זְבוּב֙ <S%H1176><s%> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְר֔וֹן <S%H6138><s%> ek-Ron, of Ekron אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- whether אֶחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> 'ech-Yeh whether I shall recover מֵחֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> me-cho-Li of this disease זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> Zeh. this ס sa-Mek

וּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> u-mal-'Ach But the angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֵלִיָּ֣ה <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Yah to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֔י <S%H8664><s%> hat-tish-Bi, the Tishbite ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh, go up לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7125><s%> lik-Rat to meet מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chei the messengers מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- of the king שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron; of Samaria וְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dab-Ber and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> ha-mib-be-Li corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- there אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto them [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you הֹֽלְכִ֔ים <S%H1980><s%> ho-le-Chim, [that] ye go לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Rosh to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל be-Va-'al זְב֖וּב <S%H1176><s%> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H6138><s%> ek-Ron. Ekron

וְלָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ve-la-Chen now therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הַמִּטָּ֞ה <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tah from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- you עָלִ֥יתָ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Li-ta on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> te-Red Thou shalt not come down מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot but shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut; die וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech departed אֵלִיָּֽה׃ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Yah. And Elijah

וַיָּשׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu turned back הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'a-Chim And when the messengers אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav; to him וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto him he said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- Why זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh unto them Why are ye now שַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H7725><s%> shav-Tem. turned back

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him אִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah up לִקְרָאתֵ֗נוּ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Te-nu, to meet וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer us and said אֵלֵינוּ֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-lei-Nu to us לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go שׁוּבוּ֮ <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vu turn again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech unto the king אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach that sent אֶתְכֶם֒ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Tem you and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> ha-mib-be-Li corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- there אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [Is it] not because [there is] not a God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you שֹׁלֵ֔חַ <S%H7971><s%> sho-Le-ach, [that] thou sendest לִדְרֹ֕שׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Rosh to enquire בְּבַ֥עַל be-Va-'al זְב֖וּב <S%H1176><s%> ze-Vuv of Baalzebub אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the god עֶקְר֑וֹן <S%H6138><s%> ek-Ron; Ekron לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> La-chen from הַמִּטָּ֞ה <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tah from that bed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who עָלִ֥יתָ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Li-ta on which thou art gone up שָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> te-Red come מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah at כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- but מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot but shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut. die

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to מֶ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat unto them What manner הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, of man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah [was he] which came up לִקְרַאתְכֶ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> lik-rat-Chem; to meet וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber you and told אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they answered אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> Ba-'al archer שֵׂעָ֔ר <S%H8181><s%> se-'Ar, him [He was] an hairy וְאֵז֥וֹר <S%H232><s%> ve-'e-Zor with a girdle ע֖וֹר <S%H5785><s%> or of leather אָז֣וּר <S%H247><s%> 'a-Zur and girt בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> be-ma-te-Nav; about his loins וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar And he said אֵלִיָּ֥ה <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Yah It [is] Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <S%H8664><s%> hat-tish-Bi the Tishbite הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- unto him a captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim of fifty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shav; with his fifty וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al And he went up אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold יֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev to him and behold he sat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh on the top הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, of an hill וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber And he spake אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto him Thou man הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech Then the king דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath said רֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3381><s%> Re-dah. Come down

וַיַּעֲנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Neh answered אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu, And Elijah וַיְדַבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> sar to the captain הַחֲמִשִּׁים֒ <S%H2572><s%> ha-cha-mish-Shim of fifty וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish If I [be] a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I תֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> Te-red come down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh then let fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, from heaven וְתֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> ve-to-Chal and consume אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲמִשֶּׁ֑יךָ <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shei-cha; thee and thy fifty וַתֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vat-Te-red And there came down אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> vat-To-chal and consumed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲמִשָּֽׁיו׃ <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shav. him and his fifty

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov Again וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach also he sent אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- captain חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim of fifty אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher unto him another וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑יו <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shav; with his fifty וַיַּ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an And he answered וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto him O man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech thus hath the king מְהֵרָ֥ה <S%H4120><s%> me-he-Rah quickly רֵֽדָה׃ <S%H3381><s%> Re-dah. Come down
